Module com.example.ims_app

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ims_app.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The Modify Product Modal View Controller which handles event and execution logic.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method (inherited by Initializable) which runs automatically upon loading the controller's associated fxml file in the main application class. Initializes pre-declared table view components and links associated Part collections with their respective field properties to column categories. Populates the associatedPartsTable with the pre-selected Product's associated parts (if applicable).
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - loads the url (automatically inherited and handled by the javafx framework)
      resourceBundle - loads the associated resourceBundle (automatically inherited and handled by the javafx framework)

    • populateModifiableProductFields

      public void populateModifiableProductFields(Product product)
      A method that should be called upon loading this controller's fxml view to pre-populate its components with the appropriate selected product properties.
      Parameters:
      product - A product object passed indirectly by the selection of a product in the partTable component

    • onAddAssociatedPartButtonClick

      public void onAddAssociatedPartButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Event handler/listener that fires from the add associated part button and adds the selected part to the product's associated parts list and reflects that in it's associated parts table. Throws exception on failure to add part or produce a popup warning on null selection.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pre-generated and auto-handled event argument.

    • onRemoveAssociatedPartButtonClick

      public void onRemoveAssociatedPartButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Event handler/listener that fires from the remove associated part button and removes the selected part to the product's associated parts list and reflects that in it's associated parts table. Displays a popup warning on null selection, or displays a popup confirmation alert if a valid part is selected and throws an exception on failure to remove part.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pre-generated and auto-handled event argument.

    • onCancelButtonClick

      protected void onCancelButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Event handler/listener that fires from the cancel button and redirects back to the main IMSApplication screen.
      Parameters:
      e - Pre-generated and auto-handled event argument.

    • onSaveButtonClick

      protected void onSaveButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Event handler/listener that fires from the save button, saves the input data as an updated product object in inventory and redirects back to the main IMSApplication screen. Checks and throws exceptions for incorrect input types and displays a popup error for incorrect inventory ranges and incorrect min/max values.
      Parameters:
      e - Pre-generated and auto-handled event argument.

    • onSearchPartsQuery

      public void onSearchPartsQuery(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Event handler/listener for the search text field that filters the associated tableview below
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - Pre-generated and auto-handled event argument.
